article_title: Why food airdrops into Gaza are controversial
sentence: Last  Thursday,  more  than  100  Palestinians  were  killed  as  crowds  rushed  to  reach  an  aid  convoy  operated  by  private  contractors  that  was  being  escorted  by  Israeli  forces  west  of  Gaza  City.

article_title: Why food airdrops into Gaza are controversial
sentence: Palestinian  health  officials  said  dozens  were  killed  when  Israeli  forces  opened  fire.

article_title: Why food airdrops into Gaza are controversial
sentence: Israel's  military  said  most  died  from  either  being  trampled  on  or  run  over  by  the  aid  lorries.

article_title: Why food airdrops into Gaza are controversial
sentence: Israel's  military  launched  an  air  and  ground  campaign  in  Gaza  after  Hamas's  attacks  on  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  around  1,200  people  were  killed  and  253  others  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: Why food airdrops into Gaza are controversial
sentence: More  than  30,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
